item.sql:
SELECT '1-' || odd_id id, '1-' || odd_parent_id pid, odd_id gid, odd_name name, 'org.png' icon, odd_id org, null nbd_other_id, null nbd_brand, null nbd_ip, null nbd_port, null nbd_dept_id, null nbd_dvc_addrs, null devstatus, null nbd_stts, odd_id cus, '-1' type, odd_seq seq FROM sys_org_dept_dtls
WHERE level < :type START WITH odd_id = :org CONNECT BY PRIOR odd_id = odd_parent_id UNION ALL SELECT id, pid, gid, name, icon, org, nbd_other_id, nbd_brand, nbd_ip, nbd_port, nbd_dept_id, nbd_dvc_addrs, nbd_stts devstatus, nbd_stts, cus, type, seq FROM (SELECT '' || nbd_id id, '1-' || nbd_area_id pid, nbd_area_id gid, nbd_name name, 'alarm.png' icon, nbd_cus_number org, nbd_other_id, nbd_brand, nbd_ip, nbd_port, nbd_dept_id, nbd_dvc_addrs, nbd_stts devstatus, nbd_stts, nbd_cus_number cus, '1' type, nbd_seq seq FROM alt_network_base_dtls UNION ALL SELECT '1-' || abd_area_id id, '1-' || abd_parent_id pid, abd_area_id gid, abd_area_name name, 'area.png' icon, abd_cus_number org, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, 0 type, abd_cus_number cus, '0' type, abd_seq seq FROM com_area_base_dtls) t

UPDATE alt_network_base_dtls SET nbd_area_id =:gid, nbd_name =:name, nbd_cus_number =:cus, nbd_other_id =:nbd_other_id, nbd_brand =:nbd_brand, nbd_ip =:nbd_ip, nbd_port =:nbd_port, nbd_dept_id =:nbd_dept_id, nbd_dvc_addrs =:nbd_dvc_addrs, nbd_stts =:nbd_stts, nbd_updt_time =SYSDATE, nbd_updt_user_id =:userid WHERE nbd_id =:id

INSERT INTO alt_network_base_dtls ( nbd_id , nbd_area_id , nbd_name , nbd_cus_number , nbd_other_id , nbd_brand , nbd_ip , nbd_port , nbd_dept_id , nbd_dvc_addrs , nbd_stts , nbd_seq , nbd_crte_time , nbd_updt_user_id ) VALUES( :nbd_id , :gid , :name , :cus , :nbd_other_id , :nbd_brand , :nbd_ip , :nbd_port , :nbd_dept_id , :nbd_dvc_addrs , :nbd_stts , :nbd_id , SYSDATE , :userid )

item.desc: 根据用户当前所属类别查询机构
item.sql:
SELECT odd_id AS id, odd_name AS name, odd_parent_id AS pid, 'org.png' AS icon FROM sys_org_dept_dtls
WHERE odd_use = 1 START WITH odd_id= :org CONNECT BY PRIOR odd_id=odd_parent_id ORDER BY odd_seq
